TopicTitle: How to launch 64 bit on Steam

Articles.Content:
Step 1. Open Steam

Step 2. Go into your games library

Step 3. Right click Kerbal Space Program and select "Properties"

Step 4. Left click "SET LAUNCH OPTIONS..."

Step 5. Type "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP_x64.exe" %command%

Step 6. Left click "OK"

Step 7. Close Properties and launch Kerbal Space Program

You can now launch 64 bit Kerbal Space Program
